alert.note: Alert for Lonoke; Pulaski (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 2:30PM CDT until August 08 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL LONOKE AND NORTHEASTERN PULASKI COUNTIES... At 228 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Parnell, moving southwest at 10 mph. Another storm was over Sherwood, and may become severe. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Sherwood... Jacksonville... Little Rock AFB... Protho Junction... Gravel Ridge... Sylvan Hills... Meto... McAlmont... South Bend... Gibson... Baucum... Macon... Rose City... Kerr... Galloway... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
